Caption: Figure 2: Overview of prototype system
Mention:
The general system architecture is shown in Figure 2.
The system has two separate components. An inference
engine is responsible for storing service advertisements
and processing match requests. The inference engine is
an OWL-DL reasoner named Pellet (Pellet 2003). The
other component of the system is the composer where
the workflow of service composition is generated. The
composer communicates with the inference engine to
discover possible matches and present them to the user.
It also lets users to invoke the completed composition
on specific inputs.
